name: Pandemonium (CJ Julian, softslayer028)
description:
In Pandemonium, the player acts as the president of a country ravaged by a virus during a pandemic. As president, they must use their Power and the country’s Funds to protect their Citizens and eliminate the Virus.

The player can use cards that either affect the whole country, or only specific regions. Either way, every decision they make affects the Country’s own Resources, which have effects of their own.

In order to win the game, the player must cure every citizen in their country, and not have a new case after some time.

The player will lose the game in 2 ways: First is through impeachment, due to the player having too little Respect. Second is the major loss of Citizens, due to the uncontrollable effect of the virus.
